trans-unit.target: {1}{W}, Do the Hokey Pokey: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to CARDNAME this turn. (To do the Hokey Pokey, choose an arm, a leg, or your whole self and put it in. Put it out. Put it in. Shake it all about. You do the Hokey Pokey! Turn yourself around.)

trans-unit.target: Exile all permanents and all cards from all graveyards. Each player shuffles their hand into their library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total becomes 10. Exile CARDNAME.

trans-unit.target: Sex Appeal

trans-unit.source: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose. If there are more people in the room of a different gender than you are as you cast this spell, prevent the next 6 damage this way instead.
trans-unit.target: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose. If there are more people in the room of a different gender than you are as you cast this spell, prevent the next 6 damage this way instead.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·14 | Bureaucracy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bureaucracy
trans-unit.target: Bureaucracy

trans-unit.resname: UGL·14 | Bureaucracy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Pursuant to subsection 3.1(4) of Richard's Rules of Order, at the beginning of the upkeep of each participant in this game of the Magic: The Gathering® trading card game (hereafter known as "PLAYER"), that PLAYER performs all actions in the sequence of previously added actions (hereafter known as "ACTION QUEUE"), in the order those actions were added, then adds another action to the end of the ACTION QUEUE. All actions must be simple physical or verbal actions that a player can perform while sitting in a chair, without jeopardizing the health and security of said PLAYER.
trans-unit.target: Pursuant to subsection 3.1(4) of Richard's Rules of Order, at the beginning of the upkeep of each participant in this game of the Magic: The Gathering® trading card game (hereafter known as "PLAYER"), that PLAYER performs all actions in the sequence of previously added actions (hereafter known as "ACTION QUEUE"), in the order those actions were added, then adds another action to the end of the ACTION QUEUE. All actions must be simple physical or verbal actions that a player can perform while sitting in a chair, without jeopardizing the health and security of said PLAYER.

trans-unit.resname: UGL·14 | Bureaucracy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When any PLAYER does not perform all the prescribed actions in the correct order, sacrifice CARDNAME and said PLAYER discards their complement of cards in hand (hereafter known as "HAND").
trans-unit.target: When any PLAYER does not perform all the prescribed actions in the correct order, sacrifice CARDNAME and said PLAYER discards their complement of cards in hand (hereafter known as "HAND").
